Their authentic thai massage fully relaxes the whole body and provides calmness and peace of mind to tackle the routine challenges of the next day. Elain Zheng
2 reviews
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
I love it! If you are craving for an authentic traditional Thai massage, this is your go to place. They have unique techniques that Is similar to what you would experienced in Thailand. Sarah did a great job and I will definitely return back for her. I was given a private room for full body massage. The room amenities and toilet was also very clean.

QQ LN
1 review
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
Thorough and high quality massage. Thanks Tina for being so accommodating, applying stronger pressure when I asked for it. My back and legs are thanking me very much rn!!!

Richard Bradshaw
Local Guide·17 reviews
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
As a veritable massage connoisseur - my GF and I go once per week on the whole and we’ve been here ten years!! - I can say this is pound-for-pound best massage for us both. Super comfy and relaxed floor level beds, well air conditioned, airy, clean massage rooms to wind down in (they’ve avoided those grimey huge chairs or massage tables + face hole that most others opt for that makes the rooms feeL stagnant and overused). Importantly TALENTED masseuse that have obviously had good training and not just going through motions, really take care to make you feel relaxed. Super friendly service always seem to manage to fit us in to our preferred timings.

Shilpa Varade
3 reviews·2 photos
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
I went for Traditional Thai massage today at Healthland Pte Ltd. This is by far the best Thai massage place I've experienced in Singapore. Good clean place, strong hands massage & very polite girls. Overall value for money. Reasonable price. Must visit

Deming
Local Guide·386 reviews·999 photos
Rated 4.0 out of 5,
Not sure whether it's related to the healthland in Thailand but the Masseur  I got is good! She used a number of techniques and really loosen up my muscles.

Only drawback is that while it is  more expensive than usual, you still have to share the room with 2 other customers. I couldn't really rest well due to a snoring customer next to me.

Gerald Khoo
Local Guide·67 reviews·8 photos
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
Nice little place in the heart of Chinatown. Went with my 3 friends on Sunday, 16/8/2020 - 5 PM. Do remember to give them a call for an appointment prior to arrival. Otherwise, you may have to wait for a time slot.
Masseurs were very well-versed in their massage, slightly different variation of your regular Thai massage which I really really appreciate. They target core areas like your legs and especially your back. They are also able to converse in both English and Mandarin. Room is basic but extremely clean with frequent sanitization. Bang for your buck. I will definitely return again if I need to release the knots in my body.
